results.title: ASUS products shine with nine CES 2024 Innovation Awards
results.content: By Edge Up January 10, 2024 1088 Here at ASUS we're always breaking the limits of cutting-edge technology, but January is truly a special time of the year. With the huge showcase that is the Consumer Electronics Show, we can reveal the latest and greatest tech that we've been developing.
results.raw_content:
ASUS products shine with nine CES 2024 Innovation Awards
Here at ASUS we’re always breaking the limits of cutting-edge technology, but January is truly a special time of the year. With the huge showcase that is the Consumer Electronics Show, we can reveal the latest and greatest tech that we’ve been developing. This year, we’re proud to announce that nine of our products received a prestigious CES 2024 Innovation Award.
From the ASUS lineup, the Zenbook Duo (2024) redefines versatility as the world’s first 14-inch dual screen OLED laptop, and the Zenscreen Fold OLED MQ17QH separates itself from the competition with its portable and versatile folding OLED display.
From ROG, OLED displays and ultraportable gaming impressed the judges. The ROG Swift OLED PG49WCD rips the battlefield wide open with a super-ultrawide 49-inch panel, perfect for race and sim enthusiasts, along with Smart KVM support for seamless control of two PCs from the same display. The ROG Swift OLED PG39WCDM and ROG Swift PG34WCDM displays pair with the ROG Aura Light Bar and ROG Desk Arm to create modular and dynamic gaming battlestations.
The ROG Flow Z13 RMT02 redefines both ultraportable gaming and chassis design, while the complementary ROG XG Mobile levels up connectivity and graphics performance with a single connector. The ROG Ally delivers seamless 1080p gaming performance absolutely anywhere. The ROG Falchion RX Low Profile showcases the best a gaming keyboard has to offer, with the premium feel of low-profile switches, and for those who desire the absolute best graphics performance available, the ROG Matrix Platinum GeForce RTX 4090 crushes the competition as the world’s first commercially available GPU equipped with high-performance liquid metal thermal compound.
Read on for a closer look at each of these award-winning products. To learn more about all the ASUS and ROG products that we announced at CES 2024, click here.
ASUS Zenbook Duo (2024)
The Zenbook Duo has always challenged the conventional wisdom of what a multi-monitor laptop should look like, but the 2024 Zenbook Duo truly raises the bar. Boasting the world’s first 14-inch dual-screen OLED laptop display and paired with a detachable Bluetooth keyboard and built-in kickstand, the Zenbook Duo is a productivity monster. With four dynamic modes and dual high-resolution 14-inch OLED panels that both boast VESA DisplayHDR True Black 500, the Duo caters to an incredibly diverse array of tasks and workflows, making it the perfect partner for any professional or creative.
ZenScreen Fold OLED MQ17QH
As the world’s first foldable OLED portable monitor, the ZenScreen Fold OLED MQ17QH OLED made waves with the judges, and it’s making waves at our CES showroom. This portable monitor is a sleek and svelte 12.5-inches when folded, expanding to 17.3-inches when you’re ready to get some work done. With a built-in stand and tripod mount, and featuring both a VESA DisplayHDR True Black 500 certification and 100% coverage of the cinema-grade DCI-P3 color space, the ZenScreen Fold OLED MQ17QH is the perfect travel companion for creative professionals who need to have a studio quality workspace wherever they go.
ROG Swift OLED PG49WCD
The ROG Swift OLED PG49WCD truly expands our portfolio of high-end OLED gaming monitors in every sense of the word. This super-ultrawide 49-inch panel is perfect for sim racing and flight enthusiasts, as well as those who can leverage dual PC operation with support for Smart KVM, which allows for seamless control of two systems with a single mouse and screen. With a large custom heatsink, the ROG Swift OLED PG49WCD ensures a long lifespan with zero fan noise, and vibrant true 10-bit colors with 99% coverage of the DCI-P3 gamut breathe incredible life into any game you play.
ROG Flow Z13 RMT02
This one-of-a-kind Flow Z13 is a collaboration between ROG and renowned design firm ACRONYM, mixing the best of ROG technology with the instantly recognizable and iconic ACRONYM design language. Equipped with a ruggedized CNC machined aluminum chassis, a multifunctional strap that easily transforms the Flow Z13 RMT02 into the perfect machine for any location shoot, and the power of up to an NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4070 Laptop GPU, this machine redefines what a gaming tablet is capable of.
ROG Ally
The ROG Ally has changed the way we think about Windows 11 gaming on the go. Despite its incredible mobile handheld form factor, the ROG Ally is a full Windows 11 gaming machine, capable of installing all your favorite PC games, regardless of the launcher. Equipped with a gorgeous 1080p 120Hz display and a custom-built cooling system designed to be used in any orientation, the ROG Ally is the perfect portable gaming machine for those on the move, whether you’re on a train, on a road trip, or 35,000 feet in the air.
ROG XG Mobile (2023)
Designed to be paired with our ROG Flow family of laptops, as well as the ROG Ally, the ROG XG Mobile external GPUs offer an instant connectivity and graphics power upgrade with one seamless connection. Boasting up to an NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4090 Laptop GPU at 175W in an enclosure the size of a hardcover novel, the XG Mobile can instantly elevate your rig to flagship status with one connection. No wonder it earned a CES 2024 Innovation Award.
ROG Swift OLED Series + ROG Aura Light Bar + ROG Ergo Monitor Arm
The next CES Innovation Award winners include an arsenal of gear aimed at upgrading your full desktop display setup into a fully operational battlestation. Equipped with third-gen ROG OLED technology, the ROG Swift OLED PG39WCDM and PG34WCDM achieve a 30% peak brightness enhancement and a 20% improvement in viewing angle with a large custom heatsink to keep operating temps low and reduce the risk of burn-in.
Whether you’re working on miniatures or the next great novel at your desk, the ROG Aura Monitor Light Bar can shine a light on your creation, with optional RGB backlighting cast on your wall for a little extra ambience. But to really elevate your game, the ROG Ergo Monitor Arm provides effortless adjustments and a full 360° of pivot. If your setup needs a makeover, consider these killer gaming upgrades.
ROG Falchion RX Low Profile
Sometimes great things come in small packages. The ROG Falchion RX Low Profile improves on the original Falchion RX keyboard with a low-profile design while retaining the same 65% keyboard layout for a supremely compact and capable gaming keyboard. A touch-based and multi-function key based control setup allows you to adjust RGB brightness and volume seamlessly despite the truncated keyboard layout, and the low-profile keys retain a 2.8mm travel distance for confident actuation for typists and muscle-memory gamers alike. Thanks to its ROG Omni Receiver, you can pair the ROG Falchion RX Low Profile with a compatible mouse with a single dongle, keeping your setup clean without sacrificing latency or performance. This keyboard is designed to travel so we paired it with a cover, allowing you to easily toss this in a bag for your next class or LAN party.
ROG Matrix Platinum GeForce RTX 4090
The last of our award winners, but certainly not least, is the incredible ROG Matrix Platinum GeForce RTX 4090. The latest in a venerated list of incredible graphics cards from multiple generations, the ROG Matrix Platinum GeForce RTX 4090 is the absolute pinnacle of modern gaming performance. For the first time ever, we’ve equipped this GPU with high-performance liquid metal direct from the factory, giving this 360mm AIO cooled card the ability to be overclocked north of 4GHz, a world record for the RTX 4090. Housed in a stunning chassis, with sleeved tubing and an extra thick 360mm radiator, the ROG Matrix Platinum GeForce RTX 4090 is a shining example of our pursuit of incredible in every product we make.
Our 2024 CES Innovation Award winners are just a small sample of the incredible new products that we have on display at this year’s Consumer Electronics Show. Click here to learn more about our latest laptops, monitors, peripherals, and more.

results.title: 5 Laptops You Must See at the ASUS Booth at CES 2024
results.content: Jan 10, 2024 Join us at the ASUS booth during CES 2024! This excellent show always provides a great opportunity for ASUS to showcase exciting new products and technologies we're making available to users around the world. Below are some excellent laptop options that are lined up for 2024! Versatility, Redefined: New Zenbook DUO
results.raw_content:
All, Tech
5 Laptops You Must See at the ASUS Booth at CES 2024
Jan 10, 2024
Author: ASUS    Reading time: 5 minutes
Jan 10, 2024
Join us at the ASUS booth during CES 2024! This excellent show
always provides a great opportunity for ASUS to showcase exciting
new products and technologies we’re making available to users around
the world. Below are some excellent laptop options that are lined up
for 2024!
Versatility, Redefined: New Zenbook DUO
The new Zenbook DUO is an innovative dual-screen laptop that’s
perfect for serious multitaskers. Packed with tailored software that
makes the user experience bliss, it allows you to intuitively take
advantage of four unique usage modes: Dual-screen mode, Laptop mode,
Desktop mode, and Sharing mode. It’s a powerful machine, too: It
comes with up to the latest Intel® Core™ Ultra 9 processor, up to 32
GB of RAM, and up to 2 TB PCIe® 4.0 SSD storage. It also packs a
powerful 75 Wh battery that powers this laptop for a whole workday.
Plus, it features latest AI technologies, including Microsoft
Copilot and Designer, to push user productivity to new heights.
Extremely Thin and Light: Zenbook S 13 OLED
For those who value mobility, Zenbook S 13 OLED is the perfect
solution. This is a refresh of the stylish, ultraportable laptop
that weighs only 1 kg and has a thin, 1 cm profile*. It comes with a
100% recyclable Plasma Ceramic Aluminum lid that gives it a unique
look and feel while making it more scratch-resistant and tough.
Designed with sustainability in mind, eco-friendly materials are
used in several of its key parts. It also now features a vivid 3K
ASUS Lumina OLED and packs powerful new components — notably up to
the Intel® Core™ Ultra 7 processor that enables AI-powered
experiences. It’s a great productivity tool that is easily portable.
Power and Elegance: Zenbook 14 OLED
The new Zenbook 14 OLED is the newest offering in the elegant,
classy Zenbook lineup with a futuristic twist. It’s very thin and
light — weighing only 1.2 kg** and measuring only 14.9 mm in
thickness — and it comes with an OLED display up to 3K 120 Hz that
offers vivid, lifelike colors. The 75 Wh battery is long-lasting,
and essential I/O ports offer the versatility users need. This year,
users can choose between up to a new-generation Intel® Core™ Ultra 9
CPU with a dedicated NPU for AI computing or an AMD Ryzen™ 8040
Series Processor with AMD Ryzen™ AI features. The Zenbook 14 OLED
strikes the perfect combination of portability, power, style, and
user-friendliness.
Style Icons: ASUS Vivobook S Series Laptops
The ASUS Vivobook S series is a thin and light laptop family that
was redesigned in 2024. The lid is now more minimalistic and
features a futuristic logotype. The series comes in three colorways:
Neutral Black, Mist Blue, and Cool Silver*. It comes in three screen
sizes: 14-, 15.6-, and 16-inch, all of which feature ASUS Lumina
OLED displays — up to 3.2K 120 Hz. Despite featuring a powerful 75
Wh battery, the 14-inch version weighs only 1.3 kg, and the 15.6-
and 16-inch versions weigh only 1.5 kg. All versions are very slim —
starting at as thin as 13.9 mm. Users get to choose between up to
the new Intel® Core™ Ultra 9 chipset and up to the new Up to AMD®
Ryzen™ 9 8945HS — both offering advantages of AI features. The CPUs
installed in these laptops feature a dedicated Neural Processing
Unit (NPU) — a groundbreaking integrated AI engine that seamlessly
delivers enriched collaboration, heightened productivity, and
superior video editing capabilities — all while conserving battery
power. Moreover, using AI is made easy and simple. The 2024 ASUS
Vivobook S laptops will feature a dedicated copilot key on the
keyboard to access the copilot features in one click.
*Color option availability varies depending on the chipset version.
Power for Creativity: ASUS Vivobook Pro 15 OLED
For creators and other users who need more power, there’s the new
ASUS Vivobook Pro 15 OLED. This laptop is powered by the new Intel®
Core™ Ultra 9 185H high-performance processor and up to an NVIDIA®
GeForce RTX™ 4060 GPU with NVIDIA® Studios Drivers. These powerful
components provide maximum performance for creative work and allow
users to use AI to boost their creativity and productivity. It also
helps ensure that workflows go uninterrupted, thanks to up to 24 GB
of DDR5 5600 MHz memory with 1 SO-DIMM slot for upgradability and up
to a 2 TB ultrafast SSD. All visual creations made on this laptop
will look amazing on the 3K 15.6-inch ASUS Lumina OLED display with
a 120 Hz refresh rate. This laptop also features the ASUS DialPad —
a virtual rotary input device, embedded in the touchpad, that gives
users intuitive and accurate way to control hundreds of apps,
including the Adobe Creative Cloud suite of apps.
More Laptop Solutions!
These aren’t the only laptops that ASUS booth visitors at CES 2024
will be able to see. You will also find the new all-business
Expertbook B5 and the world’s first Chromebook with Intel® Core™
Ultra processors — the ASUS ExpertBook CX54 Chromebook Plus. For
gamers, the refreshed ROG Strix Scar and ROG Strix gaming powerhouse
laptops will shine their RGB lights on curious onlookers, while the
new compact powerhouses — ROG Zephyrus G14 and G16 — will stun with
their sleek design and some of the world’s most powerful laptop
components packed into thin and lightweight chassis. Plus, new TUF
Gaming laptops will showcase how inclusive gaming is becoming.
Curious to learn more? Click the button below to see innovations
that ASUS will be presenting at CES 2024.
* Dimension: 296.2 x 216.3 x 10.9 ± 0.5 mm; thickness might vary
according to specifications.
** weight may vary depending on specifications

results.content:

ASUS products shine with nine CES 2024 Innovation Awards
Upgraded TUF Gaming F16, A16 and A15 laptops enter the fray
 The ROG Phone 8 and ROG Phone 8 Pro go beyond gaming with a brand-new design
Every ROG Phone is cutting edge, but the ROG Phone 8 series is something truly special: with an all-new ultra-thin design, the sleek ROG Phone 8 and ROG Phone 8 Pro are true flagships in every sense of the word. In addition, the Strix SCAR 18 is getting a Nebula HDR Display for the first time ever — and the Nebula HDR versions of both the Strix SCAR 16 and Strix SCAR 18 are getting the latest Mini LED panels with over 1100 nits of peak brightness and over 2000 dimming zones, almost double last year’s zone count. Take your audio to the next level with the ROG Carnyx microphone and ROG Cetra Speednova earbuds
If you game online with friends or create content on the side, round out your setup with the new ROG Carnyx, a professional-grade condenser microphone.
 Upgraded TUF Gaming F16, A16 and A15 laptops join the battlefield
The TUF Gaming family has long been known for delivering incredible gaming experiences with a price tag that won’t break the bank, and that tradition continues with a fully reloaded and upgraded 2024 lineup.
results.raw_content:
CES 2024: Meet the latest incredible tech from ASUS and ROG
Our showroom at this year’s Connsumer Electronics Show (CES) is overflowing with innovative new tech. We’re introducing a whole new ecosystem of BTF components that hide the cables behind the motherboard. We’re offering next-gen upgrades and a dazzling new look for some of our most popular ROG gaming laptops. We’re redefining the dual-screen laptop, debuting the world’s first foldable portable display, launching the first ROG NUC, deploying a new generation of gaming peripherals, giving you all-new OLED monitors for your gaming setup, and so much more. Our CES 2024 lineup truly has something for everyone.
Ready to meet the next generation of hardware from ASUS, ROG, TUF Gaming, and ProArt? Here, we’ll give you a quick introduction to everything that we’re announcing at CES 2024. Follow the links for in-depth coverage of each product.
Cut down on cable clutter with BTF motherboards, cases, and graphics cards
Cable management can make or break a showpiece PC build, and if you’re looking for the cleanest aesthetic possible, ROG and TUF Gaming are here to help with a brand-new motherboard standard: BTF. This new design goes back to the future by allowing components to attach to the front, while all your cables plug into the back for an insanely clean look. To give you a range of options for your BTF build, we’re debuting the ROG Maximus Z790 Hero BTF, TUF Gaming Z790-BTF WiFi, and TUF Gaming B760M-BTF WiFi D4 motherboards.
The motherboard tray in standard cases won’t let you access the connectors on a BTF motherboard, so we’re introducing two BTF chassis options for your new build: the ROG Hyperion GR701 BTF Edition and the TUF Gaming GT302 ARGB. We’re also working with the biggest names in the PC case industry to form the BTF Alliance, a partnership dedicated to giving you a wide range of cases fully compatible with our BTF motherboards.
To assemble an Advanced BTF build that not only hides the cables connected to the motherboard, but the power cables for your graphics card, as well, you’ll need a BTF graphics card. For easy installation and a clean look, the ROG Strix GeForce RTX™ 4090 BTF Edition and the TUF Gaming GeForce RTX 4070 Ti SUPER BTF White Edition graphics cards draw power through a PCIe high-power connector on the bottom rather than traditional 16-pin external power connectors.
Do more on the go with displays that redefine portability
Nothing allows you to do more on the go than an extra display. For years, ZenScreen portable displays have given you great connectivity, proven durability, and high-quality panels so that you can have extra screen space whenever and wherever you need it. Now, we’re ready to help you do even more with two innovative new display options.
The first is the world’s first foldable OLED monitor: the ZenScreen Fold OLED MQ17QH. Fully opened, it’s a large-and-in-charge 17.3-inch display with exceptional contrast, colors, and brightness. When you fold it up to slip it into your laptop bag, its waterdrop-style hinge brings the two sides of the screen close together to keep its profile compact and slim. With its versatile embedded stand, auto-rotation through our easy-to-use ASUS DisplayWidget Center app, and excellent connectivity, it’ll be easy to fit the ZenScreen Fold OLED into your workflow.
We’re also debuting our first wearable display: the ASUS AirVision M1. This display wears like a pair of glasses, giving you the screen real estate you need without demanding additional space on your lap, table, or airplane tray table. Thanks to 3 degrees of freedom positioning, you can pin a virtual screen so that it stays in a particular location relative to the device, even as you look around elsewhere. This means that you’ll still be able to easily interact with your laptop, your handwritten notes on your desk, or a coworker who needs a quick answer to a question, all without removing the AirVision M1. Additionally, you can use our Windows app to set up multiple virtual screens and place content on them just like you would with multiple physical displays on the desk in your home office.
AI enters the chat
Few technologies have transformed the way we live and work faster than generative AI. Yet everything we’ve seen thus far is just the tip of the iceberg. The next wave of AI takes your work and play to the next level by running AI-accelerated tasks locally, on your own hardware, and on your own terms.
For CES 2024, we’re debuting a wide range of new hardware that readies you to take advantage of everything that AI has to offer. From our next-gen graphics cards to our latest gaming laptops, you’ll find tech that puts the power of generative AI at your fingertips. For home users, the elegant Zenbook 14 OLED features AI-powered Intel Core Ultra processors, a dazzling OLED display, and a svelte chassis. We have great options for your small- to- medium-sized business, too: don’t miss the new ExpertBook B5 series and the ExpertBook CX54 Chromebook Plus.
The all-new Zenbook Duo reimagines the dual-screen laptop
Our dual-screen laptops let you take advantage of not one, but two integrated displays for effortless multitasking anywhere. The all-new Zenbook Duo raises the bar yet again with two full-sized ASUS Lumina OLED displays. The versatile built-in kickstand lets you use these two screens in a surprising number of ways. Between Dual Screen moode, Laptop Mode, Presentation Mode, and Desktop Mode, you’re only limited by your imagination. Use the intuitive virtual keyboard and touchpad, or use the detachable ErgoSense keyboard – it’s all up to you.
Cutting-edge internals make sure that you can do more with these Zenbook Duo. With up to an Intel Core Ultra 9 CPU, 32GB of DDR5 RAM, a 2TB SSD, and WiFi 6E, this slim and highly portable laptop gives you effortless performance.
Meet our high-performance and compact ASUS NUC and ROG NUC systems
Laptops and full-sized desktop PCs meet the needs of many users, but there are situations that call for a compact, highly customizable PC with rich connectivity options. ASUS NUC mini PCs give you outsized performance in sleek, slim designs ready for any scenario. Today, we’re ready to announce two new additions to our NUC portfolio: the ASUS NUC 14 Pro and ASUS NUC 14 Pro+. The first NUCs to feature Intel’s latest 14th Gen Core Ultra CPUs, these PCs give you outstanding performance, excellent I/O capabilities, and easy system integration, all in compact designs that you can hold in the palm of your hand.
We’re also pulling back the veil on our first NUC designed first and foremost for gamers: the ROG NUC. The ROG NUC is less than 2.5L in size, about a quarter the size of typical Mini-ITX cases. Despite its small size, the ROG NUC boasts a stunning array of gaming-first hardware. With up to an Intel Core Ultra 9 CPU and an NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4070 Laptop GPU, you’ll have outsized performance ready for any game in your library. The ROG NUC is designed inside and out for tool-free installation, offers three PCIe 4.0 M.2 slots for your gaming library, and gives you a wealth of connectivity options for setting up your full battlestation.
2024 ROG laptops forge new levels of portability
For years, the ROG Zephyrus G14 and G16 have been hailed as the best gaming laptops you can buy. And this year, they’re getting even better. We’ve redesigned our Zephyrus machines from the ground up, with a CNC-milled aluminum chassis that’s thinner and lighter than ever, while also allowing for a larger trackpad, keycaps, and speakers. A new Slash Lighting array adorns the lid for a bit of customizable flair, and the latest hardware from Intel, AMD, and NVIDIA keeps these machines performing great, whether you’re gaming, creating content, or working with the latest AI platforms.
On top of that, we’ve also outfitted these two laptops with ROG’s first notebook OLED displays. With up to 3K 120Hz on the G14 and 2.5K 240Hz on the G16, these incredible Nebula Displays have all the benefits you’ve come to expect from OLED, including pixel-perfect inky black levels, gorgeous DCI-P3 color reproduction, and insanely fast 0.2ms gray-to-gray response times for unparalleled image contrast and clarity. We’re even proud to announce that we worked closely with NVIDIA and Samsung Display to make these the first OLED gaming laptops available with NVIDIA G-SYNC technology, ensuring your gameplay stays free of tearing and stuttering from fluctuating framerates. You can read more about the new Zephyrus machines here.
These two Zephyrus machines aren’t the only laptops getting new hardware for 2024, either: the ROG Strix G16, Strix G18, Strix SCAR 16, and Strix SCAR 18 have all been upgraded to feature the latest CPUs from Intel to keep you on the cutting edge. In addition, the Strix SCAR 18 is getting a Nebula HDR Display for the first time ever — and the Nebula HDR versions of both the Strix SCAR 16 and Strix SCAR 18 are getting the latest Mini LED panels with over 1100 nits of peak brightness and over 2000 dimming zones, almost double last year’s zone count. For high-end laptop gaming that truly shines, the Strix SCAR 16 and 18 cannot be beat. Check out the full specs of the 2024 Strix lineup here.
Finally, all of our 2023 laptops will still be available throughout 2024, including the previous Zephyrus G14 and G16, the venerable Zephyrus M16, and the convertible Flow X13, Flow X16, and Flow Z13. So no matter what kind of laptop you’re looking for, ROG has an incredible selection to fit the tastes of just about anyone.
ROG Strix GeForce RTX 40 SUPER Series graphics cards take desktop gaming to new heights
NVIDIA also pulled back the curtain on their latest GPUs, and we’re excited to offer all of them in ROG Strix and TUF Gaming flavors, including some white and factory overclocked editions.
The ROG Strix GeForce RTX 4080 SUPER, ROG Strix GeForce RTX 4070 Ti SUPER, and ROG Strix GeForce RTX 4070 SUPER all come with the same class-leading build as their non-SUPER brethren, with 16-pin 12VHPWR power connectors, a metal exoskeleton with bold ROG styling, and three Axial-tech fans to keep your card running cool and quiet. You also get a Dual BIOS switch that lets you choose between maximum performance and quieter operation, as well as FanConnect II headers that allow you to control you case fans according to your GPU’s temperature. All three cards are available in OC Editions, while the ROG Strix GeForce RTX 4080 is also available in white.
You’ll also find TUF Gaming variants of the GeForce RTX 4080 SUPER, GeForce RTX 4070 Ti SUPER, and GeForce RTX 4070 SUPER, with a similar metal build, triple-fan cooling, and large heatsinks. All three TUF cards are also available in OC editions, while the TUF Gaming GeForce RTX 4070 Ti is also available in White and White BTF editions (see below). Keep an eye out for an ASUS GeForce RTX 4080 SUPER Noctua Edition coming soon as well. Check out our full article for the rundown of these new cards, and the best power supplies to pair with them.
WiFi 7 and ZenWiFi are better together
The next generation of wireless networking has arrived. WiFi 7 forges past the limitations of earlier standards to give you exceptional networking speeds for gaming, entertainment, and more.
Today, we’re lifting the curtain on three new devices that combine the power of WiFi 7 with the easy convenience of AiMesh: the ZenWiFi BQ16 Pro, ZenWiFi BQ16, and ZenWiFi BT10 mesh WiFi systems. With their dazzling data transfer speeds, excellent coverage range, and extensive subscription-free software features, these systems give you a whole-home networking upgrade.
Stay secure and connected on the move with the ASUS RT-AX57 Go travel router
Keeping all your devices connected securely while you’re traveling can be hassle, especially if you’re on a trip with your family, friends, or work colleagues. The ASUS RT-AX57 Go travel router is an easy addition to your luggage, and it’ll greatly simplify the process of staying connected even as you’re on the move.
How does the RT-AX57 Go make this happen? For starters, it’s a slim and compact WiFi 6 router ready to provide wireless networking to your devices, just like your router at home. But unlike most routers, it has a USB 3.2 Gen 1×1 port that can let you share your smartphone’s 4G/5G connection with all your devices, even those without a mobile data connection of their own. It also gives you a much more secure way of connecting to public WiFi networks with public WiFi mode (WISP mode). Thanks to AiMesh support, the RT-AX57 Go travel router can even upgrade your networking experience at home by acting as an AiMesh node with a compatible router or mesh WiFi system.
New ROG OLED monitors in every size, plus new accessories
Over the past couple of years, ROG has set new benchmarks in gaming display technology with its OLED monitors. And with so many monitor sizes, resolutions, and refresh rates available, we wanted to make sure there was an OLED for everyone. So this year, be on the watch for four new OLED monitors from ROG.
Atop the list is the ROG Swift OLED PG32UCDM, the first ROG monitor to offer Dolby Vision. The PG32UCDM pairs a 3840×2160 panel with a 240Hz refresh rate and a 0.03ms response time (GTG) for detailed images with smooth, blur-free animation, and it offers built-in KVM and a premium cooling solution. Also checking in at 32 inches is the ROG Swift OLED PG32UCDP monitor, which sports dual-mode functionality that lets you switch between 4K 240Hz and Full HD 480Hz modes to match whatever game you’re playing.
Fans of the ultrawide form factor should take note of the ROG Swift OLED PG39WCDM. This monitor boasts a unique, curved ultrawide panel with 1300 nits of peak brightness and a fluid 240Hz refresh rate. The ROG Swift OLED PG27AQDP, on the other hand, is perfect for esports gamers that want an insanely smooth 480Hz refresh rate, with a sharp QHD resolution. Check out our full rundown of the latest OLEDs to see more. You may also be interested in our ROG Ergo Monitor Arm and ROG Aura Light Bar, two accessories that let you make the most of your desk space and give your setup an ultra-sleek look, and G-SYNC Pulsar, a new technology that’s coming soon to an ROG gaming monitor.
The ROG Phone 8 and ROG Phone 8 Pro go beyond gaming with a brand-new design
Every ROG Phone is cutting edge, but the ROG Phone 8 series is something truly special: with an all-new ultra-thin design, the sleek ROG Phone 8 and ROG Phone 8 Pro are true flagships in every sense of the word. Boasting high-end performance from the latest Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 platform, all of your games will run buttery-smooth on the 144Hz AMOLED display, capable of 2500 nits of peak brightness for incredible HDR visuals.
Arguably the biggest upgrade, though, are the cameras: with all-new lenses and sensors, these cameras compete with the best phones out there, and then one-up with our 6-axis Hybrid Gimbal Stabilizer 3.0 for super smooth, stable video. We even shrunk the bezels and gave the ROG Phone 8 series an IP68 rating for dust- and water-resistance. And we did all this without getting rid of the features you love, like capacitive AirTriggers and a 3.5mm headphone jack. The ROG Phone 8 isn’t just the best gaming phone on the market — it’s the best phone, period.
Take full control with a new mouse, keyboard, and mobile gaming controller
We’re always looking for ways to give you more precise control over your gameplay, and this year we have a number of new peripherals on offer. The ROG Keris II Ace is our latest ultra-light esports mouse, weighing in at 54 grams and built with our ROG AimPoint Pro optical sensor for an ultra-sensitive DPI of 42,000.
Meanwhile, our ROG Falchion RX Low Profile keyboard boasts brand-new low profile switches and a compact 65% layout, making for an ultra-thin keyboard that can slide into your bag and go anywhere. And finally, the ROG Tessen mobile controller attaches to any phone and gives you console-grade sticks and buttons for easy, zero-latency control over all your mobile games.
Keep your system cool with ROG Strix LC III series AIOs and the new ROG Ryujin III water block
Whether you’re building a midrange gaming rig or an all-out, custom water-cooled showpiece PC, ROG has new liquid cooling products to make your build stand out. The latest ROG Strix LC III AIOs come with Asetek’s New Gen7 v2 pump and copper coldplate, and are also available in an LCD edition featuring a 2.1” IPS screen that allows you to put CPU temperatures, a system clock, or a custom image of your choosing right on the water block. These models are available in both white and black, and you can read more about this family of AIO coolers here.
And if you prefer to craft your own water cooling, the new ROG Ryujin III water block integrates with your custom loop, with a similar 3.5” LCD screen that lets you monitor system stats or show custom animations atop your CPU. Read more about the new Ryujin III water block here.
Take your audio to the next level with the ROG Carnyx microphone and ROG Cetra Speednova earbuds
If you game online with friends or create content on the side, round out your setup with the new ROG Carnyx, a professional-grade condenser microphone.
The ROG Carnyx delivers detailed, high-fidelity audio with a hassle-free USB setup. The 25mm condenser capsule ensures every detail of your voice comes through cleanly, while the built-in pop filter and premium metal shock mount keep unwanted noises at bay. Plus, like all our other ROG gear, it’s got Aura Sync-compatible RGB lighting baked right in, so you can coordinate it with the rest of your setup.
True wireless earbuds have brought new levels of convenience to on-the-go music, podcasts, and movies — but most struggle with gaming, where latency can make or break your experience. The ROG Cetra SpeedNova are different: not only do they offer a Bluetooth connection for easy on-the-go gaming, but new in 2024, they also offer an ultra low latency 2.4GHz connection using a USB receiver. That means you can get the convenience of true wireless earbuds with the lightning-fast connection of a USB headset, plus active noise canceling and RGB lighting to boot.
Upgraded TUF Gaming F16, A16 and A15 laptops join the battlefield
The TUF Gaming family has long been known for delivering incredible gaming experiences with a price tag that won’t break the bank, and that tradition continues with a fully reloaded and upgraded 2024 lineup.
Keep your enemies at the bottom of the leaderboards with high performance silicon from Intel, AMD, and NVIDIA. The TUF Gaming F16 is powered by the Intel Core i7-13650HX, a 14-core, 20-thread processor that can easily keep up with all of your favorite games. Reinforced with DDR5 4800MHz memory and up to an NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4060 Laptop GPU with NVIDIA Advanced Optimus, this machine is ready to get in the fight.
This battle tested hardware needs a proper display pairing, so we equipped the 2024 TUF Gaming lineup with some truly gorgeous displays. All three machines feature 2.5K resolution IPS displays with an ultra-fast 165Hz refresh rate for the ideal blend of image quality and responsiveness in fast-paced matches. With 100% coverage of the sRGB color space, these panels will keep your content looking vibrant.
Upgrade your rig with AMD Radeon™ RX 7600 XT graphics cards from ASUS and TUF Gaming
The AMD Radeon RX 7000 series family just got two new members, the TUF Gaming AMD Radeon RX 7600 XT and the ASUS Dual AMD Radeon RX 7600 XT. These cards offer serious affordability and 16GB of VRAM for maximum 1080p gaming performance.
The TUF Gaming Radeon RX 7600 XT is an incredible addition to your gaming arsenal, thanks to its large heatsink, vented backplate, and tri-fan design. With its incredible cooling efficiency, you’ll never be distracted in-game, and the fans even turn off entirely during light loads like web browsing for truly silent operation with our 0dB Technology.
Perhaps a tri-fan design is simply too large for your case. Fear not, for the ASUS Dual Radeon RX 7600 XT pairs the performance of AMD’s RDNA 3 architecture with a slim and compact dual-fan design. Perfect for swap-in replacements to existing systems, or pairing with a brand new SFF case, this card still keeps temperatures under control thanks to two Axial-tech fans and the same 0dB technology found on its TUF Gaming sibling.

results.title: ASUS Presents In Search of Incredible: Transcendence at CES 2024
results.content: LAS VEGAS, USA, January 9, 2024 — ASUS today unveiled its latest range of technological marvels, introduced cutting-edge products, and demonstrated its commitment to sustainability at the In Search of Incredible: Transcendence virtual launch event for CES® 2024.
results.raw_content:
ASUS Presents In Search of Incredible: Transcendence at CES 2024
LAS VEGAS, USA, January 9, 2024 —ASUS today unveiled its latest range of technological marvels, introduced cutting-edge products, and demonstrated its commitment to sustainability at the In Search of Incredible: Transcendence virtual launch event for CES® 2024.
New products include ASUS NUC mini-PCs, the result of the ASUS takeover of the Intel® NUC business. This range of small form-factor computers and barebone computer kits has been incorporated into this year’s lineup, which includes the NUC 14 Pro, NUC 14 Pro+, and other professional and gaming solutions.
ASUS also lifted the veil on several innovative products, including the revolutionary Zenbook Duo (2024), the world's first 14-inch dual-screen OLED laptop, and the ZenScreen Fold OLED, the world's first portable display with a folding OLED display. AI-powered laptops featuring the brand-new AI-enabled Intel Core™ Ultra or AMD Ryzen™ 8040 Series processors include ASUS Zenbook 14 OLED, ASUS Vivobook Pro 15 OLED, and the all-new ASUS Vivobook S series.
In the world of augmented reality (AR), users can look forward to embarking on a visual revolution with the cutting-edge AirVision M1 AR glasses, a new innovation at the forefront of wearable AR displays.
A wide range of AI-ready commercial products was introduced including the ASUS NUC 14 Pro, which serves as a worthy successor to Intel’s NUC series and was engineered for unparalleled productivity and performance in a compact format. Featuring Intel Core Ultra processors, extensive connectivity, and versatile display options, the NUC 14 Pro series ensures seamless computing experiences in diverse work environments. Other business solutions newly designed to address customer’s pain points were the ultra-quiet ASUS Fanless Chromebox CF40 and the redesigned ASUS ExpertBook B5 and ASUS ExpertCenter D5, D7, and D9. The new ASUS ExpertBook CX54 Chromebook Plus is our first ExpertBook series Chromebook, and also the world's first Intel Core Ultra-powered Chromebook Plus
For gamers, the new TUF Gaming A16 and F16 laptops were announced, as well as a major upgrade of the 2023 TUF Gaming A15 laptop. These laptops are equipped with the Intel Core HX or AMD 8000 series processors and GeForce RTX® 40 series Laptop GPUs. Also new to the TUF Gaming stable are the Z790-BTF WiFi and GeForce RTX® 40 Series BTF White graphics card, and the BTF White OC Edition motherboards.
Speaking at the event, ASUS Co-CEO S.Y. Hsu underscored the company's leading role in driving innovation. "This year we have not only continued our remarkable journey toward sustainability, but we have also leveraged our technological expertise in the field of AI and strategic alliances and partnerships, to create innovative solutions in the fields of consumer, commercial, gaming. With the dawning of a new age of AI-assisted technologies, ASUS is continuously striving to use this expertise and improve the user experience of every user.”
For those attending the event in Las Vegas, the on-site products featured during the virtual launch event, including those in the separate Republic of Gamers (ROG) CES virtual launch event, will be available for an exclusive hands-on experience at The Venetian Expo, Meeting Room #3102, from January 8 to January 11, 2024.
A commitment to quality and sustainability
ASUS will reinforce its commitment to quality and with its 2024 consumer and commercial laptops, subjecting them to rigorous MIL-STD 810H US military-grade testing for durability. This extensive testing reflects the company's dedication to providing long-lasting value and exceptional user experiences.
The launch event not only unveiled the company's latest technological innovations but also emphasized its unwavering commitment to sustainable practices. Under the theme In Search of Incredible: Transcendence, ASUS highlighted its robust ESG initiatives, integrating sustainability across products, operations, and carbon-offset services. ASUS aims for a net-zero enterprise, and the recent designation as an EPEAT Climate+ Champion serves as recognition of its initiatives and emphasizes a proactive stance in environmental stewardship. By setting ambitious near-term science-based emissions reduction targets, as validated by the esteemed SBTi, it also showcases its determination to mitigate climate impact. ASUS Carbon Partner Services, recently launched in Taiwan with ExpertBook B9403 and ExpertCenter D9, redefines business contributions to carbon neutrality, offering impactful solutions through verified and high-quality carbon-credits, and empowering customers to actively contribute to carbon neutrality.
The ASUS commitment to sustainability has earned global recognition, including acknowledgment by the Financial Times as a Climate Leader in Asia-Pacific and inclusion in the Corporate Knights Clean 200 Index. As a pioneer in sustainable technology, ASUS has a history of groundbreaking initiatives, such as the world's first carbon-neutral laptop, Bamboo-series laptops, and the recent launch of its first carbon-neutral verified business laptop in 2022.
The company actively incorporates recycled materials in manufacturing and packaging, utilizing over 1,600 tonnes of PCR plastic since 2017 and over 20,000 tonnes of recycled paper in 2022. ASUS's commitment to reducing environmental impact is evident in its recycling of over 40,000 tonnes of e-waste since 2019. The result is that revenue from eco-friendly products exceeded 87.2% of qualified revenue in 2022, highlighting continued progress towards a circular economy to minimize environmental impact.
Introducing AI-powered laptops and an expanded product portfolio
The recent strategic move by ASUS to acquire Intel's Next Unit of Computing (NUC) product line marks a pivotal moment in the company's ongoing expansion of its AI and IoT R&D capabilities. This acquisition positions ASUS to enter key markets, including industrial, commercial, and prosumer segments, solidifying its role as a leading technology solutions provider.
ASUS showcased an impressive lineup of innovative products, demonstrating the company's unwavering commitment to pushing conventional boundaries and delivering innovative technology solutions. AI-powered laptops feature the latest advancements in computing with Intel Core Ultra processors. These processors enable users to seamlessly manage complex workloads, enhance productivity, and benefit from advanced security measures. These devices represent more than just laptops; they signify a new era of intuitive and efficient computing designed to meet the diverse needs of modern consumers and professionals.
Emphasizing the transformative impact of its product portfolio, ASUS highlighted its dedication to delivering exceptional experiences that go beyond conventional constraints. The company envisions a future where intelligent, heartfelt, and joyful smart living is accessible to all, with a strong emphasis on sustainability, innovation, and user-centric design.
The event also underscored the company's integration of AI within its consumer and commercial laptop lineup, enabling users to achieve a seamless computing experience and an enhanced work-life balance. The incorporation of Intel Unison creates a unified platform, seamlessly connecting across different devices such as PCs, laptops, tablets and smartphones, facilitating effortless navigation and access to files and applications from any location.
The Intel Core Ultra Processor, equipped with an AI-focused Neural Processing Unit (NPU), serves as a powerhouse for accelerating AI workloads and running cloud-based AI programs, resulting in exceptional performance while prioritizing energy efficiency. This advancement contributes to prolonging the battery's lifespan, aligning with a more environmentally friendly approach.
With these cutting-edge technologies, users can anticipate faster content generation, simplified data analysis, streamlined multitasking, and enhanced security, ushering in an era of unprecedented computing capabilities and possibilities.
SHOWCASE: LAPTOP INNOVATION
ASUS Zenbook Duo (2024): Dual-screen innovation
The revolutionary Zenbook Duo (2024) is the world's first AI-powered 14-inch dual-screen laptop , equipped with two identical OLED touchscreens. With its detachable full-size Bluetooth® ASUS ErgoSense keyboard and touchpad, this incredible device has a user-centric design that rewrites the rule book for on-the-go versatility. This Intel Evo™ Edition laptop expertly combines multitasking versatility with superb mobility in a 1.35 kg-light
package.
The dual full-size 3K 120 Hz ASUS Lumina OLED 16:10 displays are joined by a lay-flat 180° hinge to instantly expand the visual workspace to up to a massive 19.8 inches, which thanks to the integrated kickstand and detachable keyboard can be used in vertical or horizontal orientations for several versatile user modes — Laptop, Dual Screen, Desktop or Sharing mode — controlled by the intuitive ASUS ScreenXpert software. The rechargeable keyboard can be detached to allow full use of the visual workspace or be placed on the lower display for a traditional clamshell laptop experience. Zenbook Duo (2024) maximizes productivity and play throughout the day with up to an Intel Core Ultra 9 processor with an integrated NPU for AI acceleration, 32 GB of LPDDR5x memory, up to a 2 TB PCIe® 4.0 SSD, a fast-charging and long-lifespan 75 Wh battery, and a Harman Kardon-certified Dolby Atmos® audio system. The NPU delivers low-latency AI computing, accelerating multitasking to make Zenbook Duo (2024) highly efficient for work, creativity or entertainment. And with the huge screen real estate, users can effortlessly run all their favorite productivity apps — and keep them in view — at the same time. Zenbook Duo (2024) is designed with sustainability and durability in mind. It incorporates a variety of recycled materials, and is durability tested to US MIL-STD-810H standards to maximize the device's lifespan.
ASUS Vivobook Pro 15 OLED (N6506), ASUS Vivobook S series: Powerful, stylish and easy to use
Another highlight for the consumer segment is this year’s update for the ASUS Vivobook series, which encompasses an impressive lineup of the ASUS Vivobook Pro 15 OLED and the ASUS Vivobook S series, offering exceptional performance and cutting-edge features for various user needs.
ASUS Vivobook Pro 15 OLED offers seamless creativity and gaming with cutting-edge components: up to an Intel Core 9 Ultra processor with an integrated NPU AI engine, NVIDIA GeForce RTX® 4060 GPU with a low-latency MUX switch, 24 GB DDR5 RAM, and a 2 TB NVMe® SSD. It boasts advanced ASUS IceCool Pro cooling technology that enables up to a 125 W combined thermal design power (TDP).
The exceptional 16:9 display is a 3K 120 Hz ASUS Lumina OLED with vivid colors and a quick 0.2 ms response time. ASUS Vivobook Pro 15 OLED includes many user-friendly features like the ASUS DialPad virtual rotary control, ASUS AiSense camera security features, and AI noise-cancelation technology for clearer conferencing audio. It also offers versatile connectivity and I/O via WiFi 6E, Thunderbolt™ 4, USB-C® and Type-A ports, and HDMI® 2.1. With the stylish and powerful ASUS Vivobook Pro 15 OLED, creators and gamers can finally unleash their inner pro!
ASUS Vivobook S series laptops are sleek, powerful and lightweight 14-, 15- and 16-inch Intel Evo Edition laptops that offer the ultimate experience for those seeking on-the-go productivity and instant entertainment, with modern color options and minimalist, high-end aesthetics, making them the perfect choice for balanced mobility and performance. The Intel Evo Edition ASUS Vivobook S 14/15/16 (S5406 / S5506 / S5606) are powered by Intel Core Ultra processors, with up to a 45-watt TDP and a built-in Neural Processing Unit (NPU) that provides power-efficient acceleration for modern AI applications. The AMD versions, ASUS Vivobook S 14/15/16 OLED (M5406 / M5506 / M5606), are equipped with AMD Ryzen 8040 Series processors with AMD RDNA™ 3 graphics, boasting a TDP of up to 45 watts and built-in Ryzen AI acceleration for efficient performance in modern AI applications. All ASUS Vivobook S series laptops have a dedicated Copilot key, allowing users to effortlessly dive into Windows 11's AI-powered tools with just one press.
Lifelike visuals are provided by world-leading ASUS Lumina OLED displays with resolutions up to 3.2K (S5606 / M5606) along with 120 Hz refresh rates, a 100% DCI-P3 gamut and DisplayHDR™ True Black 600 certification. The stylish and comfortable ASUS ErgoSense keyboard now features customizable RGB backlighting, and there's an extra-large ErgoSense touchpad. As with all ASUS Vivobook models, the user experience is prioritized: there's a lay-flat 180° hinge, an IR camera with a physical shutter, a full complement of I/O ports, and immersive Dolby Atmos® audio from the powerful Harman Kardon-certified stereo speakers. These Vivobook models come prepared for extended charger-free days with their exceptionally long lasting and fast-charging batteries.
ASUS Zenbook 14 OLED (UX3405 / UM3406) is a premium ultraportable laptop powered by Intel or AMD processors. The Zenbook 14 OLED features the top-tier up to Intel Core Ultra 9 processor and Intel Arc™ graphics, or the latest AMD Ryzen 8040 Series processors with AMD RDNA 3 Graphics, depending on the version. Both processor platforms incorporate the latest advances in dedicated hardware AI acceleration, with built-in AI engines that optimize performance and power efficiency. Weighting a mere 1.2 kg and measuring just 14.9 mm thin, this sleek Zenbook 14 OLED is the ultimate ultraportable laptop that takes sophistication to a whole new level. Users can seize every moment using the enhanced extended-life 75 Wh battery and achieve seamless connectivity via all the essential I/O ports – including two Thunderbolt™ 4 (UX3405) or USB4® (UM3406), USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A, HDMI® 2.1 (TMDS) and a 3.5 mm audio jack.
An immersive audiovisual experience is provided by the vivid 3K ASUS Lumina OLED 120 Hz display and powerful new super-linear speakers, and the user-friendly design incorporates convenient face login, an FHD IR camera with a physical shutter for privacy, and a new quiet ASUS ErgoSense keyboard with a large ErgoSense touchpad.
The new design offers improved sustainability with the extensive use of recycled materials for the laptop and its packaging, and US military-grade durability testing maximizes the device's service life.
DISPLAY INNOVATION
ASUS ZenScreen Fold OLED (MQ17QH): The world’s first foldable OLED portable monitor
The ASUS ZenScreen Fold OLED MQ17QH is a groundbreaking 17.3-inch QHD (2560 x 1920) foldable OLED monitor, that revolutionizes portable workspaces. As the world's first of its kind, it combines OLED brilliance with a transformative folding mechanism, redefining productivity on the go. The waterdrop-style hinge ensures a flawless fold, adding elegance to the design and facilitating seamless transitions between viewing angles. With a remarkably thin 9.7 mm profile (at its thinnest) when unfolded and a lightweight 1.2 kg chassis, this engineering marvel sets a new standard for portability and performance. The DisplayHDR True Black 500 display offers a visual feast with rich colors and stunning contrasts, maintaining true-to-life visuals through its 100% DCI-P3 color gamut and Delta-E 2 color accuracy. Versatile connectivity, including mini HDMI and dual USB-C ports, seamlessly integrates the ZenScreen Fold OLED into any digital ecosystem. Its standard tripod hole adapts to various setups, providing stability for work or creative endeavors. Users can experience the future of productivity with the ASUS ZenScreen Fold OLED, a testament to innovation.
Revolutionize your vision: Unveiling the cutting-edge ASUS AirVision M1 AR experience
Users can embark on a visual revolution with our cutting-edge AirVision M1 AR glasses, the forefront of augmented reality eyewear. These AR glasses redefine the viewing experience, boasting an FHD (1920 x 1080) Micro OLED display with an impressive 1100 nits brightness, 58 pixels per degree, and an outstanding 95% DCI-P3 color gamut for unparalleled vividness and detail. Immersive viewing takes center stage as AirVision M1 offers a 57° vertical perspective field of view, coupled with a 38° Image field of view (FOV) and 60% transmittance. Empowering users with 3 Degrees of Freedom (3DoF) positioning and an intuitive app design, AirVision M1 allows users to pin the screen at a specific location, ensuring heightened control and comfort. AirVision M1 provides users with the ability to generate multiple virtual screens in 16:9, 21:9, and 32:9 formats, offering absolute versatility.
The glasses feature an intuitive touchpad on the left temple, facilitating seamless adjustments such as brightness control, 3D mode activation, and screen pinning. Connectivity is streamlined with the USB-C port supporting DisplayPort™ Alt Mode, ensuring compatibility across various devices. Prioritizing user well-being, AirVision M1 incorporates TUV-certified low blue-light and flicker reduction, along with noise-canceling microphones and speakers for an immersive audio experience. In a privacy-focused twist, these AR glasses distinguish themselves from others on the market by ensuring that content remains confidential. The actual user interface content stays invisible to outsiders, providing a private and secure viewing experience — a revolutionary stride in the future of augmented reality eyewear.
NETWORKING INNOVATION
ASUS ZenWiFi BQ16 Pro: Award winning mesh system for worry-free smart home
Another significant announcement was the debut of the ASUS ZenWiFi WiFi 7 mesh networking system, which delivers seamless roaming and exceptional performance for future-proof smart homes. Featuring WiFi 7 technology, including the new 320 MHz band and 4K-QAM data transmission, the ZenWiFi BQ series handles demanding tasks with speeds up to 30000 Mbps. The quad-band model future-proofs the network with WiFi 6E and WiFi 7 support, using a dedicated frequency band as wireless backhaul. WiFi 7 Multi-link Operation optimizes backhaul performance, combining three frequency channels, while AI-driven band switching maximizes network efficiency. ASUS AiMesh technology extends the mesh network effortlessly with compatible ASUS WiFi 7 routers.
The introduction of the Smart Home Master feature simplifies custom subnetwork setup and management through the ASUS router mobile app, offering IoT Networks, Kids WiFi, and VPN Networks. Users can manage IoT devices under one SSID, ensure secure online experiences for children with a dedicated Kid WiFi SSID, and connect to a VPN Network within a single tap. Furthermore, The ZenWiFi BQ16 Pro is a 10-gigabit network ready for the new broadband era and the ever-evolving connected home. The ASUS ZenWiFi BQ series provides a future-ready smart home mesh network, empowering users to redefine their digital lifestyle.
NUC LEADERSHIP
NUC 14 PRO: New name, same industry-leading power
ASUS is dedicated to advancing Intel's NUC legacy with the NUC 14 Pro series, representing a pinnacle of cutting-edge technology and performance. The new NUC 14 Pro and NUC 14 Pro+ models embody Intel NUC quality with a fresh perspective. The NUC 14 Pro features a 4x4 matte textured chassis with a replaceable lid, while the NUC 14 Pro+ introduces a new 5x4 chassis crafted from premium anodized aluminum. Compatible with Windows 11, Windows 11 IOT Enterprise, and various Linux distributions, the NUC 14 Pro models epitomize versatility, delivering a dynamic computing experience tailored to the user's needs. Powered by up to Intel Core Ultra 9 processors with speeds up to 5.1 GHz Turbo, integrated Intel Arc Graphics, and Intel vPro® Technology, these desktop powerhouses redefine computing within their compact size.
The NUC Pro models are the first to feature dual-channel DDR5 support up to 5600 MHz, a maximum memory capacity of up to 96 GB, and dual-channel NVMe x4 SSD support with a BIOS configured for adapter support. Offering a comprehensive array of ports and connectivity options, the NUC 14 Pro series ensures unparalleled connectivity, endurance, and a seamless computing experience. Display versatility is pushed to the limits with support for up to four extended displays through two HDMI 2.1 (TMDS)-compatible ports and two Thunderbolt 4 ports, depending on the SKU. With two SSD slots, lightning-fast data transfer, and expandable storage capabilities, these solutions cater to diverse digital needs.
The elimination of screws for storage installation streamlines integration, making it faster, easier, and safer. Featuring a robust yet sleek matte textured (Pro) or premium anodized aluminum (Pro+) chassis, a replaceable lid, and a VESA mounting plate, these small-form-factor desktops seamlessly integrate into any workspace, offering maximum functionality without compromising style. Individual unit packaging and a three-year limited warranty underline the ASUS commitment to productivity, seamlessly blending performance and sophistication. Depending on the model, users can choose to purchase only the board for upgrading existing computers, a kit without the operating system, or a complete mini-PC with the operating system.
CHROMEBOX FOR BUSINESS
Fanless Chromebox (CF40): Quiet efficiency, seamless reliability
The ASUS Fanless Chromebox CF40 is a revolutionary business solution designed for optimal performance and reliability in contemporary workplaces. Powered by the robust Intel Celeron® N4500 Processor and fortified with Intel UHD Graphics, it ensures seamless operation without disrupting the working environment. Its user-friendly design, featuring dual HDMI ports and USB-C support, effortlessly meets diverse connectivity needs, promising a hassle-free user experience. The Fanless Chromebox CF40 is specifically crafted to streamline workflows and enhance productivity, supported by simplified IT management and a secure, always up-to-date operating system.
Centralized cloud management via the Google Admin Console ensures smooth administration and effortless system maintenance, emphasizing the device's commitment to efficiency and security. With its innovative fanless design, the CF40 represents a significant advancement, enhancing durability and leveraging the full potential of Chrome Enterprise features. This makes it an ideal choice for prolonged usage scenarios, including digital signage and kiosk operations, offering businesses and organizations long-term, dependable solutions tailored to their specific needs.
RESPONSIBLE, AI-READY BUSINESS LAPTOP SOLUTIONS
ASUS ExpertBook B5 (B5404 / B5604): An AI-ready business laptop
Crafted to meet the evolving needs of modern business professionals in today's hybrid workplaces, ASUS presented the ExpertBook B5 — an AI-ready business laptop redefining portable performance standards that's available in 14-inch and 16-inch versions. At its core, ExpertBook B5 boasts the latest Intel Core Ultra 7 processor, enhanced by three AI engines driving the next wave of business features, and improved AI-powered security. With options for NVIDIA GeForce RTX® 2050 graphics, dual SSD configuration, and a massive 64 GB dual SO-DIMM DDR5 RAM, the B5 is geared towards boosting productivity with improvements to everyday business workloads. Encased in an ultralight all-metal chassis weighing merely 1.29 kg for the 14-inch variant, the B5 is a meticulously designed solution marrying AI-accelerated performance with unparalleled portability. The magnesium-aluminum alloy design, tested to meet US MIL-STD military standards, signifies a commitment to durability. Connectivity has been improved with the inclusion of 4G LTE and WiFi 7 (CMA model only), ensuring a seamless experience for professionals on the move. ExpertBook B5 transcends conventional laptops by offering comprehensive I/O features, including a Thunderbolt 4 port and support for three 4K external displays, coupled with an RJ45 Ethernet port for office scenarios. A testament to versatility, the B5 features a convenient 180° lay-flat hinge and a 16:10 slim-bezel touchscreen compatible with an MPP 2.0 stylus. Elevating the user experience, it incorporates smart conferencing technologies like the ASUS AiSense IR camera system and AI noise-canceling, alongside options for ASUS Private View and a smart card reader. ExpertBook B5 empowers mobile professionals with multitasking confidence. Seamlessly integrating next-gen technology, it's the ultimate companion, encapsulating security, mobility, and lightning-fast connectivity in a sleek design.
ASUS ExpertBook CX54 Chromebook Plus (CX5403): The world’s first AI-ready Chromebook Plus
The new ASUS ExpertBook CX54 Chromebook Plus is a testament to innovation and sustainability, tailored for leaders and mid-level professionals embarking on a new era of computing excellence. This Chromebook stands as a pioneer in the Expert Series, powered by the latest Intel Core Ultra processors and boasting up to 16GB LPDDR5X RAM, 512GB storage, and WiFi 6E for seamless online and offline collaboration. More than a device, CX54 is a beacon of eco-conscious design, crafted with renewable energy and 30% PIR eco-friendly material. Weighing a mere 1.3 kg, its precision-crafted all-metal chassis is finished in elegant Fog Silver, showcasing premium aesthetics. Catering to the mobile workforce, CX54 features a captivating 14-inch 16:10 WQXGA NanoEdge display with 89% screen-to-body ratio and 100% DCI-P3 gamut. The immersive touch screen supports a USI stylus for creative endeavors. Connectivity is redefined with two Thunderbolt 4 ports, two USB 3.2 Gen 2 ports, and an HDMI 2.1 port, enabling professionals to sync up to three 4K monitors and additional devices, redefining Chromebook productivity. Equipped with an 8 MP camera and AI-empowered video tools, CX54 ensures confident presentations in any setting. Data security is enhanced with a fingerprint sensor, webcam privacy shield, Google Titan C2 Security chip, and enterprise-level management tools like Zero-Touch Enrollment and Google Admin Console — a reliable partner for IT managers. ASUS ExpertBook CX54 Chromebook Plus isn't just a laptop; it's an elevated computing experience, seamlessly integrating performance, security, and mobility. It's the ultimate companion for professionals on their journey, whether on business travels, at home, or in the office, empowering excellence wherever they go.
ASUS ExpertCenter D5/D7/D9 Series: Business solutions for every need and situation.
The ASUS ExpertCenter D7 SFF (D700SER) and ASUS ExpertCenter D9 Mini Tower (D901MDR) are a testament to the marriage of aesthetics and functionality. With a sleek, ultra-compact design at 8.6L and 15.9L respectively, they enhance productivity without compromise. The smart design ethos permeates every aspect, from the compact dimensions to the latest Intel 14th Gen Raptor Lake Refresh S series processors and a full-sized NVIDIA RTX® 4060 graphics card, ensuring optimal efficiency for demanding workloads, striking a balance between aesthetics, adaptability and overall performance. But it's not just about power; it's about simplifying IT management. The ASUS Tool-Free Design, coupled with innovative internal placement and cable management, elevates efficiency and upgradeability, reducing the burden on IT professionals. Security takes center stage with optional TPM chips, Kensington lock slots, ASUS Pre-Deployment Service (APDS), and ASUS Endpoint Management Service (AEMS), fortifying businesses against data breaches. In a nod to environmental responsibility, these ExpertCenter desktops are crafted with eco-friendly PCR material, a new 500w TFX platinum PSU, and a smart fan, enhancing power efficiency. Tested against US MIL-STD 810H military standards, they ensure durability in any working environment. ASUS ExpertCenter Series desktops blend unparalleled performance, reliable security, and sustainability into a trustworthy computing solution. Born from the synergy of innovation and efficiency, these devices empower businesses to thrive in the ever-evolving digital landscape. The ASUS ExpertCenter Series isn't just a desktop; it's a narrative of progress, where smart design harmonizes with efficiency and sustainability, reshaping the future of commercial computing.
ASUS ACCESSORIES OFFER QUALITY-OF-LIFE IMPROVEMENTS AND UNBEATEN INNOVATION
ASUS has seamlessly integrated peripherals and accessories into its diverse product portfolio, showcasing the brand's commitment to delivering innovative technology. Recognizing the significance of these components as critical elements enhancing user experience, ASUS meticulously designs keyboards, mice, adapters, docks, and more. These products are crafted to seamlessly integrate into various digital environments, catering to the unique needs of users across industries. Grounded in a Design Thinking philosophy, ASUS prioritizes innovation to complement and elevate the functionality and convenience of everyday tasks. The brand consistently pushes boundaries, focusing on practical and creative ways to enhance the life and work experiences of customers.
ASUS Triple 4K Thunderbolt™ 4 Dock: The 12-in-1 solution for creators
The ASUS Triple 4K Thunderbolt™ 4 Dock is a comprehensive 12-in-1 solution that transforms workspaces. Featuring dual HDMI 2.1 ports, it supports multiple high-resolution displays, such as 8K at 60 Hz, two 4K monitors at 120 Hz, or three 4K monitors at 60 Hz. With data transfer speeds up to 40 Gbps and dual SD card support, it facilitates efficient file management. This versatile dock also offers 2.5 Gbps Ethernet for rapid networking and up to 100 W Smart Charging for device power. The sleek aluminum chassis — with an adjustable stand with a locking knob that allows it to be attached to a desk edge or the rear of a monitor — combines style with functionality, making it the ultimate companion for seamless multitasking and enhanced efficiency in any workstation setup.
ASUS TUF GAMING LAPTOPS, FOR THE ULTIMATE GAMING EXPERIENCE
ASUS TUF Gaming A16 FA607 and ASUS TUF Gaming F16 FX607: Delivering a reliable portable gaming experience to all gamers
The ASUS TUF Gaming F16 is an extraordinary gaming laptop designed for an immersive gaming experience, offering top-notch performance, military-grade toughness, and advanced display technology. Powered by the latest 14th Gen Intel Core i9 processor 14900HX and up to an NVIDIA RTX® 4070 GPU with NVIDIA Advanced Optimus, it handles demanding gaming tasks with ease and precision. Its AMD-powered counterpart, the ASUS TUF Gaming A16 FA607, features an AMD Ryzen 9 7845HX Processor and up to an NVIDIA RTX® 4070 Laptop GPU with NVIDIA Advanced Optimus, delivering exceptional performance for resource-intensive games. Built to MIL-STD-810H military-grade standards, both laptops ensure exceptional durability and reliability during intense gaming. The robust design includes 84-blade Arc Flow Fans and a dust filter for efficient heat dissipation, maintaining optimal performance during extended gaming sessions. The TUF Gaming F16 and A16 feature a stunning 16-inch display with a 16:10 aspect ratio and a high refresh rate of up to 165 Hz. With FHD or 2.5K IPS display options, gamers can enjoy crisp details, vibrant colors, and swift 3 ms response times, enhanced by NVIDIA G-SYNC® technology for a seamless gaming experience. The laptops offer a remarkable 90% screen-to-body ratio, providing an immersive visual journey.
The TUF Gaming A16 enhances the gaming experience with Hi-Res Audio and Dolby Atmos® technology, delivering rich, detailed sound quality. It includes a built-in HD camera for smooth communication during gameplay, a 2 TB PCIe 4.0 SSD for ample storage, and Thunderbolt 4 support for versatile connectivity options. Both laptops are designed for maximum performance, featuring dual-channel system memory DDR5-5600 MHz and up to 2 TB PCIe 4.0 SSD for smooth multitasking and rapid data processing. The ASUS TUF Gaming F16 and TUF Gaming A16 exemplify the ASUS commitment to delivering top-tier gaming experiences, surpassing expectations, and redefining portable gaming possibilities. Users can unleash their gaming potential wherever and whenever with these cutting-edge devices.
ASUS TUF Gaming F15/17 and A15/17 (FX507/707 and FA507/707): Powerful and resistant
The ASUS TUF Gaming F15/17 and A15/17 feature up to an Intel Core i9 processor 13900H (F15/17) or an AMD Ryzen 9 Zen 4 processor (A15/17) for seamless multitasking. Users can enjoy silky-smooth gameplay graphics with the latest GeForce RTX® 40 Series Laptop GPU, delivering high frame rates even at 1440p. The dedicated MUX switch and NVIDIA Advanced Optimus, along with AI-powered DLSS technology, ensure ultra-fluid motion and higher frame rates in supported titles. Next-level performance is provided by the MUX Switch featuring NVIDIA Advanced Optimus, allowing the laptop to bypass integrated graphics automatically during gaming for increased performance and reduced latency.
All 2024 models now include a MUX Switch for effortless upgrading of storage capacity with an empty M.2 NVMe PCIe Gen 4x4 SSD slot. For 2024, the improved cooling system features dual Arc Flow Fans with an 84-blade design, providing up to 13% more airflow than predecessors and quieter operation. This design also grants access to higher GPU power targets, offering gamers a competitive edge in performance. The ASUS TUF Gaming family, equipped with these enhancements, ensures gamers have every advantage in the gaming landscape of 2024.
TUF GAMING ADVANCED BTF ECOSYSTEM
ASUS TUF Gaming Z790-BTF WiFi, ASUS TUF Gaming GeForce RTX® 40 Series BTF White Edition graphics card and GT302 White Chassis: The future of gaming
Users can immerse themselves in the future of gaming with the latest additions to the ASUS Advanced BTF ecosystem unveiled at Computex 2023, a system of hidden connectors that enables tidier builds with fewer visible cables. Crafted for uncompromised performance, the new white TUF Gaming Z790-BTF WiFi sets new standards in terms of Advanced BTF design, and it’s also the first TUF Gaming white motherboard. Its high-power graphics card slot and enhanced M.2 heatsink deliver top-tier capabilities, complemented by the QLED with DRAM detection for seamless troubleshooting. Users can enjoy superior connectivity with the ASUS White WiFi Q-Antenna while experiencing a sleek and unified build thanks to its hidden-connector design, perfectly suited for the TUF Gaming GT302 White Chassis. This white motherboard harmonizes flawlessly with the TUF Gaming GeForce RTX® 40 Series BTF White Edition graphics card, forming a unified powerhouse without the need for external connections.
The TUF Gaming GeForce RTX® 40 Series BTF White Edition allows users to step into a new era of graphics cards. The new GPUs let them experience the outstanding features of the cards, which have been fully redesigned to form a core part of the BTF ecosystem. It stands as a testament to ASUS's commitment to innovation and is on showcase at the CES 2024 ASUS booth. Learn about ASUS Advanced BTF design at https://www.asus.com/content/btf-hidden-connector-design/
LATEST ASUS PROART CHASSIS AND ECOSYSTEM
The ProArt PA602 Chassis: Exceptional cooling performance and seamless PC building experience
Also on display at CES will be the latest ProArt chassis. Featuring an open-grille front panel with wide venting slots and two thick 200 mm ProArt front fans, this chassis ensures superior airflow with minimal noise. Dual air deflectors guide cooling air precisely, optimizing temperatures for critical components like the CPU, graphics card, and power circuitry. The ample interior space accommodates large components, including motherboards up to 12 inches long and 10.9 inches wide, and supports tower coolers up to 190 mm tall or liquid cooling with top radiator support up to 420 mm. Storage options abound, offering space for up to eight 2.5-inch SSDs or four 3.5-inch HDDs.
This chassis simplifies connectivity with a unified front I/O header and tool-free maintenance via side panels that unlock with a single key. Everyday usability is enhanced by the abundant front USB ports, including a rapid 20 Gbps USB-C port, and a physical latch for the power button to prevent accidental activation. Detachable dust filters on multiple panels and an intelligent LED indicator in the front ensure an optimal and dust-free environment. With a sleek, minimalist design, tempered glass side panel, and compatibility with other ProArt components, the chassis offers a sophisticated aesthetic that complements any workspace.
In addition to the existing ProArt motherboard, VGA, and display lineups, this year marks a significant expansion with the introduction of the ProArt chassis and ProArt AIO cooler. This comprehensive expansion now completes the ProArt ecosystem, providing users with a holistic range of components and peripherals that integrate seamlessly to offer a unified, optimized user experience.
Shop and Learn
